item.title: Air gap installation
item.description: Need to test air gap installation manually for now.

item.title: Air gap installation with an instance-manager-image name longer than 63 characters
item.description: Host instance manager image under a name more than 63 characters in Docker hub Update longhorn-manager deployment flag –instance-manager-image to that value Try to create a new volume and attach it. Expected behavior:There should be no error.
